Question: A judge ruled to dismiss a defamation lawsuit against this person and his attorney Marty Singer by writer Robert Randolph.
Hints: This person was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actor for Saturday Night Fever and Pulp Fiction.
This person, the youngest of six children, was born and raised in Englewood, New Jersey, an inner-ring suburb of New York City.
This person attended Dwight Morrow High School, but dropped out as a junior at age 17 in 1971.
